lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The main goal at the summit would be to strengthen existing agreements to secure steady medium term growth and avoid "the danger of a further devaluation of the dollar" via close co-operation on economic and financial policies, Kohl added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S., Japan, Germany, Britain, France, Italy, Canada and the European Community - to go much beyond restating policy goals enshrined in the February Louvre agreement of Group of Seven finance ministers and central bankers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The talks would also include plans to dismantle runaway farm subsidies all summit nations pay to guarantee the income of their farmers and secure a share of world markets, they said.
